GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v4.19.247
GSD.description:
usb: usbip: fix a refcount leak in stub_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 247d3809e45a34d9e1a3a2bb7012e31ed8b46031, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit 3ff67445750a84de67faaf52c6e1895cb09f2c56. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: usbip: fix a refcount leak in stub_probe()
